basics.name: Alison Chan
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full stack developer trying to make a difference in the world.

work.summary: Full stack web developer with JavaScript, Node, and React
highlights: Implemented Firebase Cloud Functions to enforce business rules on a public-facing web app
Created an Ansible playbook to set up a Linux continuous integration worker node
Identified and solved pain points in build and deployment processes
Paired with other developers to increase distribution of knowledge and remove blockers
Maintained the project's Jenkins CI/CD system
Retrieved food orders from restaurants and delivered them to customers in a timely and efficient manner
Communicated with customers and restaurants to assess pickup and delivery needs and provide information of order status
Maintained accurate records of mileage driven in each shift

work.summary: Software developer consultant in the insurance industry
highlights: Simplified document management integration middleware and improved error handling, resulting in fewer system errors, improved performance, and easier troubleshooting
Improved performance and user experience within the constraints of a legacy COTS front end application
Led design review, code review, and data model discussions
Worked closely with external vendors and other business departments to troubleshoot production errors

volunteer.summary: Head of Logistics for a 1700-member local open source / DIY / science fiction convention
highlights: Oversaw the annual process of inventorying convention property
Coordinated the transportation of convention property between the storage location and the convention venue
Scheduled and directed volunteers during load-in and load-out
